content: I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
Tell me some latest tech news.

As of my latest update, here are some recent tech news headlines:

Elon Musk's Starship rocket has experienced another anomaly, resulting in an explosion. Meanwhile, Google has suffered a setback at the EU court over a record $4.9 billion fine. In other news, Microsoft is prepared to abandon its high-stakes battle with the European Union over a billion-dollar fine.

Additionally, Tesla has begun a limited robotaxi service in Austin, and astronomers are preparing to deal with an enormous amount of imagery data. 

These are just a few of the latest tech news updates. If you'd like more information or specific details on any of these stories, feel free to ask!
I'm assisting you with information and tasks.
